name: command-runner-v2
description: Run commands in the terminal from markdowns and plain text files with custom display names and named terminals.

command-runner.enableCodeLens.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for command execution

command-runner.enableDecorations.description: Enable or disable decorative borders around commands

command-runner.showHoverInfo.description: Show execution statistics when hovering over commands

command-runner.decorationBorderColor.description: Border color for command decorations (hex color code)

command-runner.decorationBackgroundColor.description: Background color for command decorations (rgba or hex color code)

command-runner.codeLensIcon.description: Icon to display in CodeLens buttons

command-runner.confirmDangerousCommands.description: Ask for confirmation before executing potentially dangerous commands

command-runner.refreshInterval.description: Interval in seconds to refresh time-ago information in CodeLens and hover tooltips (5-300 seconds)

command-runner.maxDisplayLength.description: Maximum length for command display in CodeLens before truncation

command-runner.maxCustomNameLength.description: Maximum length for custom display names before truncation

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
